container_id.returns: this function returns a character vector of the current docker container id if script process is running inside a docker container environment, or nothing if not.
container_id.title: check of the script is running inside a docker container or not?

___config_runtime_env.title: Configs of the default parallel runtime environment

___check_netstat.details: this function only works for linux platform
___check_netstat.title: Check of netstat tool is installed or not

no_netstat_warning.details: create a slave task via ``IPCSocket`` needs check of the assigned port number locally, for windows system, win32 api could be used for this job; for unix system, the ``netstat`` command will be used for check this status data.
no_netstat_warning.title: show warning message about missing ``netstat`` command
